content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "ice", "quantity": 64, "index": 13}, {"type": "cactus", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 32, "index": 22}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]

thought: The first step in crafting lime_wool is crafting lime_dye. Lime_dye can be crafted from green_dye and white_dye, which can be crafted from cactus. Therefore, I will smelt the cactus in slot 17 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 17 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 64, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 32, "index": 22}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the green dye, I need to move it to the crafting table. I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 64, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 32, "index": 22}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have moved the green dye to the crafting table, I need to move the white dye to the crafting table. I will move it to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 64, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 32, "index": 22}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the lime dye, I need to move it to an empty slot. I will move it to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 64, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 32, "index": 22}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a lime_wool, I first need to craft a lime_dye, which requires placing a lime_dye on the crafting table. Since there is already a lime_dye in my inventory (at slot 11), I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 64, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 32, "index": 22}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]

thought: Now that I have placed the lime_dye on the crafting table, I can craft it into a lime_wool by placing a white_wool next to it. The white_wool is in my inventory at slot 19, so I will move it to slot 2 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 64, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 32, "index": 22}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the lime_wool, I can move it from the crafting table to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
